enrolled-dateline.#text: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Thursday, the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen

congress.#text: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America

official-title.#text: To extend the authority of the Supreme Court Police to protect court officials away from the Supreme Court grounds.

role.#text: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.

header.#text: Extension of authority of Supreme Court Police to protect court officials off Supreme Court grounds

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: HR 2922 ENR: To extend the authority of the Supreme Court Police to protect court officials away from the Supreme Court grounds.
